abstract: A Python toolbox to automatically generate the QI reports of the HFR-Ibiza system, operated by SOCIB.
description: The SOCIB HF-Radar Automatic Report Generator is a set of Python/Octave/LaTex scripts developed at SOCIB to automatically generate the monthly quality information reports of the SOCIB-HF Radar system of the Ibiza Channel, based on the information available in the SOCIB THREDDS Data Server (TDS) Catalog. These reports aim to extract useful and meaningful information from the HF radar data using qualitative and quantitative data analysis methods, being publicly available at https://www.socib.es/?seccion=observingFacilities&facility=radar#reports.

name: SOCIB HF-Radar Automatic Report Generator
